name: From Darkness - A Text Adventure
description:
A quick text adventure about darkness, existence, discovery, perseverance, and other stuff.

My first text adventure.  Made in Unity, for a Udemy course, but also for fun.   Made in a day.

Recommended to play in fullscreen.

Feel free to leave feedback

Code is here https://github.com/fragmental/03-Text-101-From-Darkness
